Create a customizable recipe app that generates unique and interesting recipes based on ingredients available in the fridge.
Develop a virtual assistant that can help you plan your daily tasks and routines, providing reminders and suggestions to keep you on track.
Create a virtual reality experience that allows you to whisk ingredients together in a virtual kitchen, with different mixers and techniques to keep things interesting.
